content: measurements width approx 68 cm / 26 3/4 length approx 87 cm / 34 1/4 materials drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300 g color 02 off white piece can also be knitted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group a - see link below drops circular needle 60 or 80 cm / 24 or 32 size 3 mm/us 2 5 or size needed to get 24 stitches and 32 row in stockinette stitch = width 10 cm / 4 and 10 cm / 4 vertically
